channel.title: CVE Feed for wproyal -- Royal Elementor Addons and Templates
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wproyal -- Royal Elementor Addons and Templates

item.title: CVE-2024-2799|2024-04-23T05:33:31.936Z -- wproyal -- royal%20elementor%20addons%20and%20templates
item.description: The Royal Elementor Addons and Templates plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Image Grid & Advanced Text widget HTML tags in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.96 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-3675|2024-06-06T18:03:15.123Z -- wproyal -- royal%20elementor%20addons%20and%20templates
item.description: The Royal Elementor Addons and Templates plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Flip Carousel, Flip Box, Post Grid, and Taxonomy List widgets in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.971 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
